channel.description: Recent content in beer on Also sprach tealeg...

item.title: Geoff embraces his new life
item.description: Nic seems to specialise in taking shots of me in compromising positions. Here I am at the local Biergarten (Lochham) , drinking König Lüdwig dunkels bier (my favourite German beer) and supporting Germany in the match against Portugal. For some reason it looks like my ear was bleeding, it wasn’t. Role on Turkey.. probably not one to be in the center of München for given the reaction of the Turkish population here following their victory the following night.

item.title: Excellent beer
item.description: Following on from my cider related shenanigans, I’ve just found a beer I haven’t had before that’s really improved my evening. Summer Lightning by the Hopback Brewery. You can get it in Waitrose. It’s a nice light flavour with an excellent roundness. Perfect for the glourious summer we’re not having here in the UK. See http://www.hopback.co.uk for details.
